Class GamePhysics

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.copakond.sweetfluffysheep.model.utils.levels.GamePhysics
public class GamePhysics extends Object
GamePhysics class is responsible for handling the physics of the game. It checks for collisions between game objects, handles character movement, and manages the interactions between characters and items.

      public static void loadMapObjects(Start start, Goal goal, List<Tile> tiles, List<Wolf> enemies, List<Sheep> sheep, List<Item> items, List<Arrow> arrows)
      Initializes the GamePhysics class with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting point of the game.
      goal - The goal point of the game.
      tiles - The list of tiles in the game.
      enemies - The list of enemies in the game.
      sheep - The list of sheep in the game.
      items - The list of items in the game.
      arrows - The list of arrows in the game.

    • unloadMapObjects

      public static void unloadMapObjects()
      Unloads the map objects and resets the GamePhysics class.

    • tileNotExists

      public static boolean tileNotExists(int[] tilePos)
      Checks if the tile does not exist in the tile map.
      Parameters:
      tilePos - The tile position.
      Returns:
      true if the tile does not exist, false otherwise.

    • checkCharactersStruggle

      public static PhysicsEventsEnum checkCharactersStruggle(Character character)
      Checks if there are any characters before the given character nearby. Prevents characters from getting stuck in each other, there is any character in front of the character, slow down
      Parameters:
      character - The character to check.
      Returns:
      SLOWDOWN if characters are close, NO_COLLISION otherwise.

    • checkCollision

      public static PhysicsEventsEnum checkCollision(Character character)
      Checks for collisions between the character and other game objects.
      Parameters:
      character - The character to check for collisions.
      Returns:
      the type of collision event, more at PhysicsEventsEnum class.

    • decideClockwiseRotation

      public static boolean decideClockwiseRotation(int textureRotation, DirectionEnum direction)
      Decide which direction to rotate
      Parameters:
      textureRotation - the rotation of the texture
      direction - the direction to rotate
      Returns:
      true if the rotation is clockwise, false otherwise
